channel.title: Web Novel Collection

item.title: My Awesome Web Novel: Chapter Future: Scheduled Release
item.description: A test chapter scheduled for future release to demonstrate the scheduled publishing feature.
item.content:encoded:
Chapter Future: Scheduled Release

This is a test chapter with a future publish date. It should not appear in the generated site until August 1st, 2025.

This chapter demonstrates the scheduled publishing feature:

item.title: My Awesome Web Novel: Chapter 2: A New Journey Begins
item.content:encoded:
Chapter 2: A New Journey Begins

With the prophecy burning in her mind, Aria packed her belongings and set out into the wilderness, unaware of the dangers that awaited her.

The morning mist clung to the cobblestones as she walked through the empty streets of Eldoria. Behind her, the great librari…

item.title: My Awesome Web Novel: Chapter Recent: Just Published
item.description: A test chapter with a recent publish date to demonstrate the scheduled publishing feature.
item.content:encoded:
Chapter Recent: Just Published

This chapter has a publish date of January 23rd, 2025, which is in the recent past. It should always appear in builds.

This demonstrates that the scheduled publishing feature only affects chapters with future publish dates.

item.content:encoded:
Chapter 2: The Tower’s First Trial

item.title: My Awesome Web Novel: Chapter 3: Ancient Ruins
item.content:encoded:
Chapter 3: Ancient Ruins

Deep in the Whispering Forest, Aria stumbled upon ruins older than memory, where ancient magic still lingered in the crumbling stones.

item.title: My Awesome Web Novel: Chapter 1: The Prophecy Unveiled
item.description: Aria discovers a mysterious scroll that will change the fate of the realm forever. The prophecy begins in the ancient city of Eldoria.
